Name: Button
Description: Interactive clickable control with text or image and click/press/release events.

Properties.Name: ContentLayout
Properties.Description: Controls the layout of the button's image and text.

Properties.Name: Text
Properties.Description: The text displayed on the button.

Properties.Name: CharacterSpacing
Properties.Description: Spacing between characters in the button text.

Properties.Name: FontFamily
Properties.Description: Font family for the button text.

Properties.Name: FontSize
Properties.Description: Font size for the button text.

Properties.Name: TextTransform
Properties.Description: Transform applied to the button text (None, Uppercase, Lowercase).

Properties.Name: FontAutoScalingEnabled
Properties.Description: Enables automatic font scaling according to accessibility settings.

Properties.Name: CornerRadius
Properties.Description: Corner radius applied to the button.

Properties.Name: Padding
Properties.Description: Inner padding of the button content.

Properties.Name: LineBreakMode
Properties.Description: How text wraps or truncates within the button.

Events.Name: Clicked
Events.Description: Raised when the button is clicked.

Events.Name: Pressed
Events.Description: Raised when the button is pressed.

Events.Name: Released
Events.Description: Raised when the button is released.

Constructors.Description: Creates a Button and sets its text.
Creates a Button, sets text and registers a click handler.
